data.title: Frank Lloyd Wright
data.meta_description: Wright’s first independently-built project was his own house, which he began in 1889 while he was working for his mentor, Louis Sullivan. The house was completed within a year, but Wright continued to expand and rework the house over the next eight years. At first the changes were necessitated by…
data.meta_site_name: Frank Lloyd Wright | Ken Burns | PBS
